name: bj-ndxid

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wceq(c0, cslot(cfv(c0, cnx))), wceq(c1, cfv(c0, cnx)))

body.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cslot(cfv(c0, cnx)))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(c0, cnx))
-| wi(wceq(c1, cfv(c0, cnx)), wceq(c0, cslot(cfv(c0, cnx))))
body.pretty:
⊢ c0 = Slot((c0 ` ndx))
⊣ c1 =(c0 ` ndx)
⊣ (c1 =(c0 ` ndx)→ c0 = Slot((c0 ` ndx)))
